name: Teleren Dreams
description:
Teleren Dreams is a unique 2d side scrolling game where you have to explore the maze like levels to find golden medallions or even bits of May's story.

Game features:

* Great 2d visuals

* Multiple quick thinking sections

* Ten different levels to experience

* Maze like gameplay.

In this game, you avoid the mobile skulls while trying to find the secrets of the maze.

Play in different mazes and improve your skills with familiar areas and quick reflexes to collect all the medallions as fast as you can.

May (your character) cannot attack but it can be implemented if necessary.

Play with the the directional arrow keys on keyboard.

You can use the the backspace key to go back to the main screen.

Collect berries and see how high your final grade gets.

Already have a game? No problem, use the 'Load' button at the main screen to continue.

Survive all the levels and get the ability to replay them.

Have fun in this exciting easy to learn game.

Teleren Dreams is subject to updates with added stories more features and new levels.
